content: antonio s spring cappellino is the first hat in ***the four seasons*** collection it is widely believed that antonio vivaldi s inspiration for the four seasons stems from the time he spent as the court chapel master in the gorgeous countryside of mantua italy this is spring like its companion vivaldi spring mitts this sweet cappellino is a tangle of leaves and tender shoots reaching for the sun with buds ready to burst forth in a celebration of the season the lace pattern is rhythmic and easy to memorize and is both written and charted an optional secondary lace weight fuzzy yarn approx 35 yards can be carried along with the main color to * tint * the buds included is a tutorial for the easiest-ever-no-turn bobble this cappellino is sized to fit an average teen/adult head 20-24 inches/50-60cm antonio s spring cappellino has been test knit in lieu of paying a fee for this pattern please consider making a donation to world central kitchen since 2010 world central kitchen has been providing meals to communities affected by conflict natural disasters and climate crisis all over the world https //wck org
